roleset.name: (try to) stop, prevent
roleset.note: HINDER-V NOTES: Member of VNcls forbid-67. (from hinder.01-v)

role.descr: secondary predication on arg1 or action

example.name: transitive
example.text: Prudential-Bache's Mr. Rodgers said he doesn't see the industry's capacity-expansion program hindering takeover activity.

example.name: with secondary predication
example.text: While ``the tone'' of domestic and international air-freight markets remains sound, [seasonal factors]-1 are likely *trace*-1 to hinder Burlington Air from matching third-quarter results in the fourth quarter, Pittston said.
example.arg: from matching third-quarter results in the fourth quarter

example.name: with instrument?
example.text: John hindered Mary from studying with his incessant pleas for sex.
example.arg: with his incessant pleas for sex
